response.overview: On September 22, 2017, Kirin Beverage Shunan Sports Center in Shunan, Yamaguchi, Japan hosted NJPW Road To Destruction 2017.  The main event featured Los Ingobernables de Japon (BUSHI, EVIL, Hiromu Takahashi, SANADA & Tetsuya Naito) vs CHAOS (Kazuchika Okada, Toru Yano & Will Ospreay).  The card also featured Hiroshi Tanahashi, Tiger Mask & Togi Makabe vs Davey Boy Smith Jr., Lance Archer & TAKA Michinoku.  Other wrestlers on the show include Hirai Kawato, Hiroyoshi Tenzan and Jushin Thunder Liger, and more!
response.title: NJPW Road To Destruction 2017: Day 10
